CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Power Sponsor / Decision Maker" ), "Power Sponsor / Decision Maker; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Sponsor/ Champion" ), "Sponsor/ Champion; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Influencer" ), "Influencer; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Business User" ), "Business User; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Evaluator" ), "Evaluator; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Purchasing / Procurement" ), "Purchasing / Procurement; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Financial Buyer" ), "Financial Buyer; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Technical Buyer" ), "Technical Buyer; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Operational Buyer" ), "Operational Buyer; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Legal Approver" ), "Legal Approver; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Decision_Making_Role__c , "Unknown" ), "Unknown; ",null )
CustomField.label: Decision Making Role
